scripts.post-install-cmd: if [[ `echo npm -v` ]]; then npm install; fi

scripts.test:okta-hosted-login: if [[ -f testenv ]]; then source testenv; fi && npm run test:okta-hosted-login
scripts.test:resource-server: if [[ -f testenv.resource-server ]]; then source testenv.resource-server; fi && npm run test:resource-server
scripts.get-okta-oidc-tck: if [[ `echo npm -v` ]]; then npm run get-oidc-tck; fi
